channel.title: [PI] making other people connect to my server
channel.description: what exactly do i change in the client to make people connect to my server? ive done port forwarding etc right im pretty sure about that

item.title: [PI] making other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

[quote=“x pk3r xx, post:3, topic:400829”][quote author=$Nathan link=topic=497885.msg3641020#msg3641020 date=1309013905]
Client.java,

server = "127.0.0.1"

Change that to the IP your using to host the server.
[/quote]

thanks[/quote]I’m glad to help.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] making other people connect to my server
